properties.entry: SELECT username, password, user_enabled, first_name, last_name, email, mobile_number, registration_date FROM target_trak_sec.users WHERE username = :username

INSERT INTO target_trak_sec.users (username, password, user_enabled, first_name, last_name, email, mobile_number, registration_date) VALUES (:username, :password, :enabled, :firstName, :lastName, :email, :mobileNumber, :registrationDate)
